name: 3.3 "I Call Your Name" Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 3 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Why was Diane having a bad day?
questions.correct: She had a problem with Frasier.
options: She had a problem with Sam.
She had a problem with Carla.
She had a problem with her mother.
questions.explanation:
She had a problem with Frasier.

	Diane called one of the patients a jerk under her breath. So Coach asked what was wrong and she said she was having a bad day.

questions.text: When Diane said, "He insists on making mountains out of mole hills", how did Carla respond?
questions.correct: "He wants you to wear a padded bra?"
options: "He is giving you a hard time?"
questions.explanation:
"He wants you to wear a padded bra?".

	Carla was always cracking jokes at Diane's expense. One of her favorite topics was Diane's bust size.

questions.correct: He saw a postal worker remove a fragrance from a mail catalog.
options: He ran out of beer money.
He had a crush on Carla.
questions.explanation:
He saw a postal worker remove a fragrance from a mail catalog.

	Cliff wasn't going to turn the man in until Carla called him a chicken. Cliff did call but pretended to be someone else.

questions.text: Who was involved in the problem Cliff had?
questions.explanation:
Lewis.

	Lewis was played by Sam Scarber. He is originally from St. Louis.

questions.text: Was Cliff scared of the man he had the problem with?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	That was why he used another voice when he called to turn Lewis in. Lewis was a big guy and therefore was intimidating to Cliff.

questions.text: What language was Coach supposedly learning?
questions.explanation:
French.

	Coach wasn't picking up the words, only the accent. Carla asked him to "say how are you in French" and he said the same thing, but with the accent.

questions.correct: Diane called out the wrong name during sex.
options: He called out the wrong name during sex.
He lost his license to practice psychiatry.
He was upset that Cliff turned in his co-worker.
questions.explanation:
Diane called out the wrong name during sex.

	Apparently, Diane called out Sam's name. When he went to see Sam about it, he used fake names but Sam figured it out.

questions.text: What was Sam's advice to Frasier?
options: To turn up the stereo so he didn't hear it anymore
questions.explanation:
That it happened to everyone.

	After he told him that it happened to everyone, he told him that the reason he turned his stereo up so loud was because it happened to him. Sam was amused by the fact Diane was calling his name while in bed with Frasier.

questions.text: Did the man who Cliff turned in know Cliff turned him in?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Cliff wrote the name of another man however Lewis never looked at it. When Cliff said the man was really sorry, Lewis said, "You better be."

questions.text: Whose name did Cliff write on the paper when turning the guy in?
questions.explanation:
Juan Toraz.

	He said that Lewis would never hit Juan. Juan was in a full body cast.
